section_id.description: Identifier of the section that was retrieved.

blocks.description: Ordered list of blocks that compose the section.

text.description: Block content with optional redaction applied.

truncated.description: Indicates whether the section content was truncated due to caps.

next_page.description: Contains pagination parameters when additional section content is available.

start_block.description: Zero-based index for the next page start.

end_block.description: Zero-based index for the next page end.
